extraction_note: Copied from extracted_data1 directory - Matter 1.4 cluster data

clusters.name: Refrigerator Alarm

attributes.name: Mask
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate a bitmap where each bit set in the Mask attribute corresponds to an alarm that SHALL be enabled.

parameters.description: This command allows a client to request that an alarm be enabled or suppressed at the server.

AlarmBitmap.description: Bitmap type for refrigerator alarm status

clusters.description: This cluster is a derived cluster of Alarm Base cluster and provides the alarm definition related to refrigerator and temperature controlled cabinet devices.
